description:
html: parse <isindex>

Pass tests2.dat, test 42:
<isindex test=x name=x>

| <html>
|   <head>
|   <body>
|     <form>
|       <hr>
|       <label>
|         "This is a searchable index. Enter search keywords: "
|         <input>
|           name="isindex"
|           test="x"
|       <hr>

messages.text:

Please take another look.

LGTM.

Wow! This tag is terrible.

Hello nigeltao@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Committer: Nigel Tao <nigeltao@golang.org>

On Nov 16, 2011, at 6:11 PM, nigeltao@golang.org wrote:

> Wow! This tag is terrible.

And most likely the list of sites we'll encounter that actually use it is shorter than the code to parse it.

subject: code review 5399049: html: parse <isindex>
